Text: Proxy.Switcher.Pro's website indicates this program is NOT for Windows Vista or Windows 7. Only from XP on back. You should have noted this, sergiufro.
I don't know where walkingcougar2005 got their info but it's wrong. This program even works with Windows 8 preview starting with version 5.4. Go look again before posting bulls**t.
Thank you serguifro for this useful program!!! BTW do you know how to allow Proxy Switcher to automatically configure proxy setting for the Opera browser (version 12 - 64 bit). Once again thanks!
